title: Welcoming Remarks by Chairman Bernanke at the Federal Reserve System and Federal Deposit Insurance Corporation Conference on Mortgage Foreclosures and the Future of Housing
content: For release on delivery  8:30 a.m. EDT  October 25, 2010      Welcoming Remarks      by     Ben S. Bernanke     Chairman     Board of Governors of the Federal Reserve System     at      “Mortgage Foreclosures and the Future of Housing Finance”     a Joint Conference Sponsored by the Federal Reserve System   and the Federal Deposit Insurance Corporation     Arlington, Virginia    October 25, 2010
